paragraph:
Welcome to the dessert bar app! It is our mission to provide excellent service. With this app we are able to accomedate all our customers' orders, and output them as efficiently as possible. This will result in faster service times. 
 Please use the arrow keys + enter to navigate through this app. Some pages will use letter keys + enter. You can view your order in 'View Order', then go to 'Submit Order' when you're ready to checkout!
